docs.text: 汇编语言范例 出自《汇编语言程序设计》第四章 代码 .section .data output: .ascii "The processor Vendor ID is 'xxxxxxxxxxxx'\n" .section .text .globl _start _start: movl $0, %eax cpuid movl $output, %edi movl %ebx, 28(%edi) movl %edx, 32(%edi) movl %ecx, 36(%edi) movl $4, %eax movl $1, %ebx movl $output, %ecx movl $42, %edx int $0x80 movl $1, %eax movl $0, %ebx int $0x80 编译,链接 $ as -o cpuid.o cpuid.s $ ld -o cpuid cpuid.o 运行！ ./cpuid 运行结果为: The processor Vendor ID is 'xxx'
docs.title: cpuid-Hellow_world!

docs.text: 出自《汇编语言程序设计》第四章
docs.title: 汇编语言范例

docs.text: .section .data output: .ascii "The processor Vendor ID is 'xxxxxxxxxxxx'\n" .section .text .globl _start _start: movl $0, %eax cpuid movl $output, %edi movl %ebx, 28(%edi) movl %edx, 32(%edi) movl %ecx, 36(%edi) movl $4, %eax movl $1, %ebx movl $output, %ecx movl $42, %edx int $0x80 movl $1, %eax movl $0, %ebx int $0x80
docs.title: 代码

docs.text: $ as -o cpuid.o cpuid.s $ ld -o cpuid cpuid.o
docs.title: 编译,链接

docs.text: ./cpuid 运行结果为: The processor Vendor ID is 'xxx'
docs.title: 运行！

docs.text: 使用 mkdocs 搭建个人博客 安装 pip install mkdocs 项目创建 mkdocs new my-project 启动 mkdocs serve 自定义 (1) 站点名称 site_name: xxxx (2) 主题 theme: readthedocs (3) 分级显示文章示例 nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md 构建页面 mkdocs build
docs.title: getting_started

docs.text: 安装 pip install mkdocs 项目创建 mkdocs new my-project 启动 mkdocs serve 自定义 (1) 站点名称 site_name: xxxx (2) 主题 theme: readthedocs (3) 分级显示文章示例 nav: - Home: index.md - About: about.md 构建页面 mkdocs build
